org.apache.thrift.transport
类 AutoExpandingBufferReadTransport

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport
      org.apache.thrift.transport.AutoExpandingBufferReadTransport

public class AutoExpandingBufferReadTransport
extends TTransport

TTransport for reading from an AutoExpandingBuffer.

构造方法摘要
AutoExpandingBufferReadTransport(int initialCapacity, double overgrowthCoefficient)
           
 
方法摘要
 void close()
          Closes the transport.
 void consumeBuffer(int len)
          Consume len bytes from the underlying buffer.
 void fill(TTransport inTrans, int length)
           
 byte[] getBuffer()
          Access the protocol's underlying buffer directly.
 int getBufferPosition()
          Return the index within the underlying buffer that specifies the next spot that should be read from.
 int getBytesRemainingInBuffer()
          Get the number of bytes remaining in the underlying buffer.
 boolean isOpen()
          Queries whether the transport is open.
 void open()
          Opens the transport for reading/writing.
 int read(byte[] target, int off, int len)
          Reads up to len bytes into buffer buf, starting at offset off.
 void write(byte[] buf, int off, int len)
          Writes up to len bytes from the buffer.

read

public final int read(byte[] target,
                      int off,
                      int len)
               throws TTransportException
从类 TTransport 复制的描述
Reads up to len bytes into buffer buf, starting at offset off.

指定者：
类 TTransport 中的 read
参数：
target - Array to read into
off - Index to start reading at
len - Maximum number of bytes to read
返回：
The number of bytes actually read
抛出：
TTransportException - if there was an error reading data

           throws TTransportException
从类 TTransport 复制的描述
Writes up to len bytes from the buffer.

指定者：
类 TTransport 中的 write
参数：
buf - The output data buffer
off - The offset to start writing from
len - The number of bytes to write
抛出：
TTransportException - if there was an error writing data

getBytesRemainingInBuffer

public final int getBytesRemainingInBuffer()
从类 TTransport 复制的描述
Get the number of bytes remaining in the underlying buffer. Returns -1 if this is a non-buffered transport.
